content: HHDCA+ Concrete ceiling anchor Economical ceiling anchor with closed eyebolt for medium-duty ceiling wire hanger applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features One-piece metal hanger Easier to install â€“ no torquing required: just hammer into hole and pull back using claw hammer to set quickly and easily Eye hole for wire attachment Shallow embedment in concrete These ceiling anchors are suitable for immediate load application after correct installation Applications Hanging drop ceilings, lights, and other devices from a concrete slab ### TECHNICAL DATA: Head configuration: Closed eyebolt Environmental conditions: Indoor, dry conditions Approvals / Test reports: N/A Technical Data | Head configuration | Closed eyebolt | Environmental conditions | Indoor, dry conditions | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated ### ITEMS- 2335257 - HHDCA Concrete Ceiling Anchor 1/4 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HHDCA+ 1/4 Ceiling hanger Anchor - 3762005 - CEILING HANGER HHDCA+ 1/4 Anchor MC - Package Size 1 pc
